settings.heading: DETAILS
settings.content:
So easy to get sexy: Shake and hold product 25-30 cms from the face, close eyes and mouth and spray 3-4 times all over face, and more on areas of focus. Gently pat until fully absorbed. Use twice a day as part of your sexy skin routine. 

Use before makeup to smoothen and sculpt skin for the perfect canvas.

Tip: Don’t just stop at your face. Lift Me Up can also be used on the neck and décolletage.

*Sediments may occur due to the natural ingredients used. This will not affect the product in any way, simply shake before using.

2x 50ML /1.69 OZ

2x 5ML / 0.169 OZ

settings.heading: KEY INGREDIENTS
settings.content: Amino-Peptide blend including Acetyl Hexapeptide-8 and Methylsilanol Hydroxyproline Aspartate smooths and sculpt for flawless skin instantly. (no filter needed!). Hydrolyzed collagen plumps and hydrates for strong, supple sexy skin that is soft to the touch.

settings.heading: FORMULA
settings.content: Water/Aqua/Eau, Propanediol, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Propolyne Glycol, Methylsilanol Hydroxyproline Aspartate, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-Octanediol, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Dipotassium Glycrrihizate (Licorice Root Extract), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Delces (Orange) Peel Oil, Lysine, Alanine, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Phenylalanine, Proline, Serine, Threonine, Tyrosine, Valine, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Benzophenone 4, Disodium EDTA

settings.heading: CLINICAL RESEARCH
settings.content:
- Results from our study shows within 1 minute of application:
- 93% of respondents saw positive results upon application
- 77% saw and felt their skin get firmer instantly
- 69% saw their cheekbones and jawline look more sculpted instantly
- 46% felt their skin hydrated instantly
- 42% saw their skin radiant and glowing
* Clinical studies taken from self-assessment of 26 individuals
